remarks: A finite union of bounded sets is bounded.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ssfiunibd.fi $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
ssfiunibd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ z e. U. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
ssfiunibd.bd $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> E. y e. RR A. z e. x B <_ y ) $.
ssfiunibd.ssun $e |- ( ph -> C C_ U. A ) $.
ssfiunibd $p |- ( ph -> E. w e. RR A. z e. C B <_ w ) $.
$d A w x z $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B w x $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x $.
$d ph w x z $.
$d ph x y z $.
